Standard Description: Verify experimentally the properties of rotations, reflections, and translations:

Skill.name: Describe transformations informally
Skill.description: Describe a translation or rotation of a shape using informal language, such as 'slide' and 'turn'.

Skill.name: Draw images of figures under reflections on a grid

Standard Description: Lines are taken to lines, and line segments to line segments of the same length.

Standard Description: Angles are taken to angles of the same measure.

Standard Description: Parallel lines are taken to parallel lines.
